scripts.client:install: cd client && yarn install && yarn dev
scripts.server:install: cd server && yarn install && yarn start:dev
scripts.client:prod: cd client && yarn install && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.server:prod: cd server && yarn install && yarn build && yarn start:prod
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "yarn database:up" "yarn run server" "yarn run client"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "yarn database:up" "yarn run server:prod" "yarn run client:prod"
